Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.weather

Class WeatherType

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.weather.WeatherType
Direct Known Subclasses:
WeatherTypeAny, WeatherTypeClear, WeatherTypeLightning, WeatherTypeRain
public abstract class WeatherType extends Object
Abstract class for weather types.
